F5 Agility Labs - Index¶

Welcome to the F5-Automation-and-Orchestration lab. The purpose of this lab is to help you get quickly familiar with some aspects of the automation toolchain F5 networks provides.

The content contained here leverages a full DevOps CI/CD pipeline and is sourced from the GitHub repository at https://github.com/f5devcentral/F5-Automation-and-Orchestration. Bugs and Requests for enhancements can be made using by opening an Issue within the repository.

Contents:

  • 1. Environments & Lab Topology
  • 2. Declarative Onboarding
    • 2.1. Declarative Onboarding – Getting Started
  • 3. Application Services 3 Extension (AS3)
    • 3.1. AS3 – Getting Started
    • 3.2. Using AS3 with Big-IQ
  • 4. Telemetry Streaming
    • 4.1. Setup AWS CloudWatch IAM User
    • 4.2. Setup AWS CloudWatch Log Group
    • 4.3. Deploy and Start UDF
    • 4.4. Configure Postman
    • 4.5. Send Declaration
    • 4.6. Generate Traffic on BIG-IP
    • 4.7. View Logs in AWS CloudWatch
